game.name: The Dark Forest: Survival
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Camera Comfort, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Survive in The Dark Forest, a zombie-infested woodland. Upgrade your weapons, gather resources, and withstand brutal, blood-soaked waves in first-person combat — alone or in co-op with up to 4 players.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Survive in The Dark Forest, a zombie-infested woodland. Upgrade your weapons, gather resources, and withstand brutal, blood-soaked waves in first-person combat — alone or in co-op with up to 4 players.
